about_the_game:
Welcome to Zombie Restaurant!

In a world devastated by a zombie epidemic, not all the undead are bad—most of them are just hungry. In Zombie Restaurant, you are the chef of a peculiar restaurant that caters to a very special clientele: zombies! From juicy burgers to tacos, you’ll be serving up all kinds of delicious dishes.

Help Us Improve!

Your feedback is essential to make Zombie Restaurant the best game it can be. We’d love to hear your ideas and comments! At the end of each session, you’ll find a direct link to a quick survey. Tell us what you think and how we can improve!

Add Zombie Restaurant to your wishlist and be the first to know when updates and additional content are released. Join our player community and help shape the future of Zombie Restaurant!
detailed_description:
Welcome to Zombie Restaurant!

In a world devastated by a zombie epidemic, not all the undead are bad—most of them are just hungry. In Zombie Restaurant, you are the chef of a peculiar restaurant that caters to a very special clientele: zombies! From juicy burgers to tacos, you’ll be serving up all kinds of delicious dishes.

Help Us Improve!

Your feedback is essential to make Zombie Restaurant the best game it can be. We’d love to hear your ideas and comments! At the end of each session, you’ll find a direct link to a quick survey. Tell us what you think and how we can improve!

Add Zombie Restaurant to your wishlist and be the first to know when updates and additional content are released. Join our player community and help shape the future of Zombie Restaurant!
name: Zombie Restaurant Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (32-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1050
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1660
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound Blaster Z

short_description: The demo version includes only one level, allowing us to gather feedback for the upcoming levels. Cook burgers, tacos, and sopes—yes, we know, these zombies have some pretty strange tastes. A zombie and cooking game all in one, where you'll have to cook to survive.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
